notificationsList.title: You have unseen messages on Couchers.org

notificationsList.body: It's a nice gesture to write references and helps us build a community together! References will become visible 2 weeks after the stay, or when you've both written a reference for each other, whichever happens first.
notificationsList.title: You have 3 days to write a reference for Test User!
